message.content:
cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.GT, cs.HC. 

The paper deals with the problem of synthesizing safe-by-design control strategies for semi-autonomous systems, which involves the use of artificial intelligence (AI) techniques. Therefore, cs.AI is the most likely sub-category. The paper also discusses the use of games to generate guidelines, which falls under the sub-category of game theory (cs.GT). The paper also deals with robotics (cs.RO) and control systems (cs.SY), which are closely related to the topic. Finally, the paper discusses the role of human operators in semi-autonomous systems, which falls under the sub-category of human-computer interaction (cs.HC).
